HowItWorks.title: How FacePet Works
HowItWorks.heroDescription: FacePet uses NFC technology to keep your pets safe and connected. Here's how our innovative system works.

attachChip.title: Attach NFC Chip
attachChip.description: Securely attach the FacePet NFC chip to your pet's collar or harness.

createProfile.title: Create Pet Profile
createProfile.description: Set up your pet's profile with photos, medical info, and contact details.

shareCommunity.title: Share with Community
shareCommunity.description: Anyone can scan the chip to access your pet's information and contact you.

peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind
peaceOfMind.description: Your pet is protected 24/7 with instant access to vital information.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose FacePet?
whyChoose.description: Our NFC-based system provides instant access to your pet's information, ensuring they're always protected and connected.

instantId.title: Instant Identification
instantId.description: Anyone can scan the NFC chip to instantly access your pet's profile and contact information.

emergencyContact.title: Emergency Contact
emergencyContact.description: Quick access to owner and veterinarian contact information in emergency situations.

noSubscriptions.title: No Subscriptions
noSubscriptions.description: One-time purchase for lifetime peace of mind. No monthly fees or recurring costs.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Pet?
cta.description: Join thousands of pet owners who trust FacePet to keep their furry friends safe.
